001package org.biopax.validator.web;
002
003import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
004import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
005import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
006import org.springframework.web.multipart.commons.CommonsMultipartResolver;
007import org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.*;
008import org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver;
009import org.springframework.web.servlet.view.JstlView;
010
011
012@SpringBootApplication
013@EnableWebMvc
014public class Application implements WebMvcConfigurer {
015
016  public static void main(String[] args) {
017    SpringApplication application = new SpringApplication(Application.class);
018    application.run(args);
019  }
020
021  @Override
022  public void addResourceHandlers(ResourceHandlerRegistry registry) {
023    registry.addResourceHandler("/**").addResourceLocations("classpath:/static/");
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public void configureViewResolvers(ViewResolverRegistry registry) {
028    InternalResourceViewResolver resolver = new InternalResourceViewResolver();
029    resolver.setPrefix("/jsp/");
030    resolver.setSuffix(".jsp");
031    resolver.setViewClass(JstlView.class);
032    registry.viewResolver(resolver);
033  }
034
035  @Bean(name = "multipartResolver")
036  public CommonsMultipartResolver multipartResolver() {
037    CommonsMultipartResolver multipartResolver = new CommonsMultipartResolver();
038    multipartResolver.setMaxUploadSize(-1);
039    return multipartResolver;
040  }
041
042}
